text: Gu Bon-seung (born September 11, 1973) is a South Korean actor and singer. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean male television actors Category:South Korean male film actors Category:South Korean male musical theatre actors Category:South Korean male singers Category:Myongji University alumni Category:South Korean Buddhists
